programme.title: Sacred Heart
programme.desc: Sacred Heart chronicles the journey of a man who rejects God and his faith, after the tragic death of his pregnant wife and then challenges the Devil.

programme.title: Revenge
programme.desc: Unlicensed private detective, Franck Beriat hesitantly agrees when a woman finds him to seek revenge for her sister.

programme.title: Assassins Revenge
programme.desc: The skyscrapers of New York glisten like golden lights, but all is not well in the city. After a highspeed chase through the city streets ends in his partner's death, Detective Frank McMillian decides to take the law into his own hands.

programme.title: Grizzly II: Revenge
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when a giant Grizzly, reacting to the slaughter of Grizzlies by poachers, attacks at a massive big-band rock concert in the National Park.

programme.title: Relentless
programme.desc: An American mother searches for her daughter who was kidnapped by human traffickers in El Salvador, the murder capital of the world. The trail takes her through Central America and Mexico via �The Train of Death�. Inspired by true events.

programme.title: Paint It Red
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers knock off Bohemian tenants in search for their stolen loot.

programme.title: Out of the Fight
programme.desc: Out of the Fight is a feature film dealing with a hardened US Army Soldier fighting the demons of Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD).

programme.title: No Loss, No Gain
programme.desc: A mysterious modern-day Robin Hood gives the victims of a bank robbery a million dollar opportunity.

programme.title: Necropath
programme.desc: A mentally deranged maniac stalks victims to fulfill his drug addiction and sedate psychosis until he becomes the victim of an unexpected invasion of the undead. This is a prototype film, to be used to present for future larger production.

programme.title: Natural Vice
programme.desc: When Adam LeBlanc, the CEO of a psychedelic drug manufacturing company, fatally cuts ties with his double-dealing distributor Kaishen.

programme.title: The Motorcycle Illustrated
programme.desc: To pay tribute to his great grandfather, Cutler Gray builds his own "motorized bicycle" and rides 1000 miles from Los Angeles to Seattle.

programme.title: Monochrome
programme.desc: A disillusioned young woman becomes a serial killer a brilliant detective to use his unusual neurological condition to track her down.

programme.title: Middle Men
programme.desc: Chronicles Jack Harris, one of the pioneers of internet commerce, as he wrestles with his morals, and struggles not to drown in a sea of con men, mobsters, drug addicts, and porn stars.

programme.title: Meander
programme.desc: A woman gets locked in series of strange tubes full of deadly traps.
